static ChannelMode [] Alaris.Irc.Rfc2812Util.ChannelModesToArray ( string  modes  )  [static]

Convert a string of ChannelModes characters to an array of ChannelMode enums.

Parameters:
modes A string of ChannelMode chars from the IRC server.
Returns:
An array of ChannelMode enums. Charactres that are not from RFC2812 will be droppped.

Using the rules set forth in RFC 2812 determine if an array of channel names is valid.

Returns:
True if the channel names are all valid.

Returns:

static string [] Alaris.Irc.Rfc2812Util.ParseUserInfoLine ( string  fullUserName  )  [static]

Break up an IRC user string into its component parts.

Parameters:
fullUserName The user in nick!user form
Returns:
A string array with the first item being nick, then user, and then host.
